text: Aitchisoniella himalayensis is a species of liverwort in the Exormothecaceae family. Its natural habitats are rocky areas and cold desert of Sichuan and Himachal Pradesh. It is threatened by habitat loss. == References == Category:Endangered plants Category:Marchantiales genera Category:Flora of Sichuan Category:Flora of West Himalaya Category:Monotypic bryophyte genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aitchisoniella
